title: #344: Return of Poor People Drama
description:
***This episode was cut short and re-uploaded! Full length is two hours and thirty nine minutes!
Vanderpump Rules returns, and jimmies are rustled. Then we celebrate the first RHOC reunion of the season by saying WOW a lot before laughing our butts off over Real Housewives of Atlanta. Enjoy! Subscribe at http://www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens for bonus episodes, ringtones, and live group video chat parties.

Timestamps:

00 Crappens Superfight
15:40 Vanderpump Rules Returns
1:28:25 RHOC Reunion 1
2:09:00 RHOA Returns

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
